item.description:
Ben S. has again organized this event

Come one, come all to one of our ever popular Sunday Brunches…this time at the Cottage Restaurant on Rt 9, Chestnut Hill. http://cottagechestnuthill.com/index.html

Choose your entree from a selection of delicious offerings and enjoy the conversations & laughter of your fellow diners. Mark and I have been hosting this brunch for over 6 months and everyone enjoys the group. We now have friends that attend frequently. This is a good opportunity to greet Meetup people. We usually get 38 members and guests.

Attendees are responsible for their own meal; please pay server. Paypal is not accepted at this event. Plenty of parking in the rear.
item.how_to_find_us: You won't be able to miss us!
item.name: A St Patrick's Day Sunday Brunch
